HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Voridus
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Voridus focuses on aggressive rush attacks and uses his unique incendiary gel weapons to create damaging pools of toxic liquid.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Pavium
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Pavium's ephitet of 'The Unbreakable' comes from his mastery of defensive and economic tactics.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Yapyap THE DESTROYER
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: At last, a Grunt rises to become a mighty leader. Or at least outnumber the enemy with an endless supply of cheap, expendable units!

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Serina
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Smart AI that ran the Spirit of Fire's systems before being lost with all hands, Serina was an expert in cryo technology.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Commander Jerome
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Omega Team's leader and a veteran Spartan of the Spirit of Fire, Jerome inspires and bolsters troops under his command.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: The Arbiter
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: The Arbiter Ripa 'Moramee utilizes special stasis fields to trap enemies and control the battlefield.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Sergeant Johnson
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Sergeant Major Avery Johnson, a hero of the Covenant War, geared up for battle. He's a dangerous adversary due to his powerful mechs and solid command.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Colony
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: A colony of Lekgolo with a focus on tough frontline units and healing.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Kinsano
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Kinsano is all about the burn, launching pyrotechnic attacks and covering the battlefield in flame.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Sergeant Forge
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Forge's strengths lie in armored aggression and slow-building economy, using heavy vehicles to push through enemies.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Atriox
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Atriox focuses on a cunning and defensive style supported by an advanced economy and the power to make units temporarily invulnerable.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Professor Anders
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Anders' scientific expertise allows her to field Sentinel units and makes all of her upgrades cheaper and faster.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Shipmaster
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: The Shipmaster favors stealth and cloaking powers, teleportation tactics, and rapid assaults against his foes.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Decimus
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Decimus is a berserker who relies on hard-hitting rushes and a unique power to siphon his enemies’ health when attacking.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Isabel
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: Isabel improves the effectiveness of vehicles using her database of the latest UNSC tech, and employs hacking and distraction powers in battle.

HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Name: Captain Cutter
HW2LeaderDisplayInfo.Description: As Captain of the Spirit of Fire, Cutter can send in powerful orbital support, drop specialized UNSC units, and enhance currently deployed units.
